item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 1, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:

25. Do AI companies work? (321 points | 320 comments)
26. Keep Track: 3D Satellite Toolkit (159 points | 36 comments)
